apihelp-query+rwrecords-summary: List all transcriptions of records made by a speaker in a given language.
apihelp-query+rwrecords-param-language: Qid of the language's local wikibase item.
apihelp-query+rwrecords-param-speaker: Qid of the speaker's local wikibase item.
apihelp-query+rwrecords-param-limit: How many transcriptions in total to return.
